name: minASAP
description:
minASAP (portmanteau of "minimum" and "ASAP" ("as soon as possible")) is an endless rhytym-based survival game where your only wits are your reflexes. Press each arrow key that appears onscreen to destroy their associated arrows and earn points. Try to do your absolute best against a progressively faster gameplay difficulty and survive as long as possible!

FREESOUND credits: InspectorJ (the explosion sound) and kaiodelesis (the background music).

This game can also be played with a PS4 controller.

PS4 controls:

Square: Left arrows
X: Down arrows
Circle: Right arrows
Triangle: Up arrows
Options Button: Start game (on menu screen) / Restart game (upon game over)
